title: Bloomberg Intelligence Radio: Roku, Wynn, Disney (Podcast)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Intelligence Radio: Roku, Wynn, Disney (Podcast)
description:
In this week’s Bloomberg Intelligence Radio show, analyst Geetha Ranganathan explains why reaching a carrier agreement with Charter is so important for Disney. Brian Egger reviews Wynn's results, Woo Jin Ho looks at the opportunity for Roku, and Stephen Chiu analyzes China's interest rate reform. Tax analyst Andrew Silverman shows how Democratic candidate Kamala Harris' plan could harm regional banks. Bloomberg Intelligence provides in-depth research and data on more than 2,000 companies and 130 industries. Hosts: Alix Steel and Paul Sweeney

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
